basic.Target Organism: [Ref.7999137]Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=2.5 µg/ml), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=10 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=10 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=25 µg/ml), Shigella dysentariae (MIC=25 µg/ml), Pseudomonas putida (MIC=100 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=100 µg/ml), Eshchericia coli (MIC=75 µg/ml);Fungi:Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC=200 µg/ml), Candida albicans (MIC=200 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=200 µg/ml), Proteus mirabilis (MIC>200 µg/ml), Serratia marcescens (MIC>200 µg/ml).
